name: pdfx-test-harness
description: Test harness for comparing PagedJS, Vivliostyle, and WeasyPrint PDF/X output

scripts.test:kitchen-sink: bun run scripts/batch-process.ts --input examples --output output/kitchen-sink --html kitchen-sink.html
